General.Name: F&C Investment Trust PLC
General.Description: F&C Investment Trust PLC operates as an investment company. Its objective is to secure long term growth in capital and income from an international investment portfolio. F&C Management Limited manages the investment portfolio of the company. The company is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 100 East Pratt Street, Baltimore, MD, United States, 21202
